title: How to Manage Your Account Settings on Yahoo!

steps.title: Hover over your profile picture in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Hover over your profile picture in the top-right corner. If you don't have a profile picture, this will be your initial. If you aren't already logged into your account at https://www.yahoo.com/ , do so now.

steps.title: Click Overview.
steps.content: Click Overview . This is in the drop-down menu. You may be asked to verify your password.

steps.title: Update your personal information.
steps.content: Update your personal information. Click Personal info at the top, next to Overview . On this page, you can update your Yahoo account picture, your name and display name, birthday, gender, and location/language settings. [1] X Research source To change your profile photo: Click Update profile photo . Click Upload from device . Select a photo. To change your personal details: Click Update personal details . Enter a new first name, last name, preferred name, gender, and/or date of birth. To change your language settings: Click Update language . Click the Preferred language drop-down menu. Select a new language. Click Save updates .

steps.title: Enable 2-Step Verification.
steps.content: Enable 2-Step Verification . This helps prevent unauthorized users from accessing your account. You can Do the following: Click Security at the top. Underneath 2-Step Verification , click Turn on . Select: Push notification , Your phone number , Authenticator app , or Security key . Follow the on-screen instructions.

steps.title: Change your password.
steps.content: Change your password. Changing your password every few months can keep hackers at bay. If you want to change it, do the following: Click Security at the top. Click Change password . Enter a new password. Click Continue .

steps.title: Add recovery methods.
steps.content: Add recovery methods. If you ever get locked out of your account, recovery methods can make it easy for you to get back in. You can add a recovery email or recovery phone number. Do the following: Click Security at the top. Scroll down to How we make sure it's really you . Click Add email or Add phone number . Enter an email or phone number. If needed, enter the confirmation code.
